# Problem Description

The ability to utilize analytics to predict automobeile lossess is a area of active research and application throughout the insurance and fin-tech industries. All of the "big four" US domiciled auto insurrers being State Farm, Geico, Allstate, and Progressive are actively engaging in research to operationalize analytical models to increase operational efficency. [citation needed...]. This dataset is representitive of claims data common to all of these auto insurance providers, and the industry at large.  

From a consumer standpoint, this has the potential to reduce average claim times, reduce premium costs, and improve claims decisions (total loss, not total loss).
